Question
========

A person achieves a score of 10.3 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 10.5 with a standard deviation 3.2. The z-score of the person with 10.3 good is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -1.45
* -0.75
* -0.06

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-1.45: Incorrect
-0.75: Incorrect
-0.06: Correct
